Good. Stuff.
Dead by Daylight features two teams--four survivors and one killer--and pits them against one another in a battle for all the marbles: The four survivors need to repair five generators to power the gates which will allow them to escape. The killer needs to find the survivors, knock them down, put them on hooks and then sacrifice them to their otherworldly gods. 
It's fun- even if its the same over and over again.

The DLC's don't cost too much and there's new content coming out on the regular.

В целом игра хорошая, но присутствуют некоторые моменты, которые сильно бесят.
Плюсы:
1. Уникальный геймплей.
2. Графика
3. Разнообразие персонажей
4. Куча перков.
5. Пока что не встречал русских.
Минусы:
1. Отбитые токсичные игроки.
2. Пинг и частые вылеты.
3. Много бесполезных перков.
arrumem a hitbox obrigado
Dead by daylight.

Very fun game to play with your friends, problem is there are things that should be attended, things that make it less fun, for example the hook system should be reworked, in the earlier state of the game one could remove the hooks completley and they didn't come back. Obviously that would ruin the game for the killer since many brought with them toolboxes and removed all the hooks. Now you can still remove hooks but they are only gone for a very short amount of time therefore there are basically no point in risking it to remove the hooks because they will get back up asap. (there are some ways to kind of counter it, but I won't get into that here.) All in all the game is a lot of fun both as killer and as survivor.

cool

Disclaimer: I started following DbD since it came out, but I decided to buy 2 weeks ago.

Dead by Daylight (DbD) is an intense survival game where you group up with friends and try to escape from the Killer. There are a variety of survivors and Killers, each equipped with unique perks that give you bonus effects. You can unlock items in the Bloodweb (you earn points after each match and spend them there) such as Toolboxes, Flashlights and Medkits to use during the match. However, if you die, you lose your items (if you win = keep). You need to be stealthy, because there are crows around the map and they give away your position if you run near them. You can also loop over pallets and vault over windows in order to stun the killer and give yourself some precious seconds for that nice hide spot. The Killer can check the lockers you hide in and if he hits you 2 times, you are knocked down and he can pick you and hook you. DbD is heavily reliant around teamwork and communication, so it's better to have friends to play with. If you choose to play with randoms there can be some griefers who are afk or act like r.etards, but it's rare. 

Pros:
+ Great fun with friends if you don't take the game seriously
+ Most great perks and characters are free and you don't have to spend money 
+ Variety of characters
+ You can progress really fast if you know the basics
+ Great skins btw
+ It's often on sale 
+ The Nightmare aka Freddy Krueger :D

Cons:
- Hitboxes 
- Toxic Killers and survivors (facecampers and ppl that team with the Killer or DC after being hooked)
- Sometimes mouse clicks won't register and that will cause deaths by not unhooking or failing a skill check when it shouldn't be like that 
- Killer queues take a few minutes but it's not that bad

The depth of strategy for each killer mixed with the perk system means that killing your little survivors is surprisingly complex.
Its a real fun game with friends or even playing alone with random players. The goal is to fix 5 generators before the killer gets you 3 times and game over.

Bu oyun mükemmel eğer DLC almayacaksanız en iyi katiller ; the wraight, the hilbilly ve the hunters. En iyi DLCsiz survival ise claduate morel. Ama DLC alırsanız alcağınız katilin vidyolarına bakın. Bence NİGHTMARE, DOKTOR, SHAPE, CANNİBAL, GHOST FACE DLCli olan en iyi katillerden. Bence paranıza değer bir oyun oyunun vidyolarına baktıysanız ne kadar güzel olduğunu anlarsınız.
